title: Lael Wilcox Smashes Guinness World Record with 108-Day Ride Around the World
content:
Wilcox, 38, rode 18,125 miles miles during her journey, which is slightly more than the circumference of the globe.

Read the full article at Lael Wilcox Smashes Guinness World Record with 108-Day Ride Around the World on Velo.
author: Betsy Welch
